footer.description: Cashvio is the modern POS and inventory management solution that helps businesses grow.

hero.title: Run Your Business
hero.subtitle: Cashvio is the all-in-one POS and inventory management platform that helps you sell more, manage better, and grow faster.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for modern businesses

pos.title: Lightning-Fast POS
pos.description: Process transactions in seconds with our intuitive point-of-sale system. Works offline too.

inventory.title: Smart Inventory
inventory.description: Real-time stock tracking, automatic reorder alerts, and multi-location support.

analytics.title: Actionable Analytics
analytics.description: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive reports and AI-powered insights.

multistore.title: Multi-Store Ready
multistore.description: Manage all your locations from one dashboard. Sync inventory and sales instantly.

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with your favorite tools - accounting, ecommerce, delivery, and more.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our expert team is always ready to help you succeed, day or night.

testimonials.title: Loved by Business Owners
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers have to say

testimonial1.quote: Cashvio transformed how we run our retail stores. Sales are up 40% since we switched.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: The inventory management alone saved us countless hours. Highly recommended!

testimonial3.quote: Finally, a POS system that actually understands what small businesses need.

q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: Is there a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes! All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days, no questions asked.

contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Cashvio, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, billing information, and business details.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and respond to your comments and questions.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting our business, or servicing you.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@cashvio.com.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Cashvio. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cashvio's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Cashvio provides point-of-sale, inventory management, and business analytics software. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as expressly stated in our refund policy.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Cashvio shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@cashvio.com.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
